name: Legend Of the Bananaman
description:
A colorful action adventure game with funny looking character design and awesome boss fights! The game as of now is finished. If you would like, leave your opinion  in the comments below!

Help Bananaman save earth and his people by killing -Banana (Negative Banana).Meet all kinds of enemies and four different dimensions!

With an estimated 35 minutes of Gametime, you will have a few good laughs and have a fun time! I'm sure you got time to waste!
